evidence.claim: HRSoft utilizes AWS services for scalability and reliability in their HR solutions.
The company implements HIPAA compliance standards in its HR and payroll services.
HRSoft integrates with EHR systems for seamless data management and compliance.
Their platform supports HL7 messaging standards for healthcare integrations.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of focus on X12 transactions or EDI clearinghouse capabilities found.
